<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 18"
    pfs=""
>
[Genius Diadem](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3125)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=683" />
<trait label="No Alignment" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=532" />
<trait label="Arcane" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=534" />
<trait label="Intelligent" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=636" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 305 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn circlet

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Perception** +22; precise vision 30 feet, imprecise hearing 30 feet, constant [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66)

**Communication** speech ([Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), and eight other common languages)

**Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +34, seven [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) skills +28, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +28, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +28

**Int** +8, **Wis** +0, **Cha** +4

**Will** +24 

</column>

---        

The _genius diadem_ is a _crown of intellect_ that typically acts like an arrogant professor or mentor, often boasting that it is a certified greater intellect and far superior to your own intelligence, even after the benefits the diadem grants you. The _genius diadem_ encourages you to learn things for yourself rather than actually attempting to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) for you, though you or your allies might be able to play on its arrogance using [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) to trick it into doing so. In addition to allowing you to activate it, the diadem can use the Search Your Mind activation with its own actions, though if it does so, the diadem gains the benefits instead of you. Only the diadem can use the following activation.

**Activate—Brain Drain** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** The _genius diadem_ casts 7th-rank [_never mind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1614).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Genius Diadem
